text: Metre gauge is a type of railway track gauge. Railways with a gauge of millimetres are called metre gauge. It is used in many regions across the world, though some railways were upgraded to standard gauge in the 20th century. ==Related pages== * Narrow gauge railways, by gauge and country == Other websites == *http://parovoz.com/spravka/gauges-en.php Category:Rail infrastructure
title: Metre gauge
